message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a price that is beneficial for both of us.
Alice, your offer is tempting but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This still provides you with a profit, and allows me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. While I appreciate your willingness to meet my minimum requirements, I would like to counter with a price of $11,000 for the product. This still offers a good profit margin while considering your budget constraints.
